title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.12 - Counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.12 - Counsel

State Regulations
(a) The Banking

Board may retain counsel to advise and assist it, or the hearing officer, in
the conduct of the proceedings and the preparation of any documents. The name
of such counsel shall be placed upon the record at the outset of the
hearings. (b) The appearance of any
party by attorney shall be noted by filing with the Banking Board a statement
signed by the party setting forth the name and address of such
attorney. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
